channel.title: Runserver.bat
channel.description:
my runserver.bat used to work but now its not here it is: @echo off title server java -Xmx1024m -cp
.;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bi
n.jar server pause
anything wrong with with? it sayd "java" it not reconised as a internal or external command, operable program or bath file. press any key to continue...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 10:10:25 pm[/size][hr]wow! no replies!! im sick of helping others and not getting any help in return i fixed the problem my self.

item.title: Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @New_owner New_owner
item.description:
@New_owner wrote:

my runserver.bat used to work but now its not here it is:
@echo off
title server
java -Xmx1024m -cp

.;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bi

n.jar server
pause

anything wrong with with? it sayd “java” it not reconised as a internal or external command, operable program or bath file.
press any key to continue…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 10:10:25 pm[/size][hr]wow! no replies!! im sick of helping others and not getting any help in return i fixed the problem my self.
